languages.text: "А? Ты уже закончил разглагольствовать? Я слегка вздремнул{mf||а} под твою болтовню — можешь повторить сначала?"

traits.locale_text: "А? Ты уже закончил разглагольствовать? Я слегка вздремнул{mf||а} под твою болтовню — можешь повторить сначала?"

languages.text: "Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"
languages.original_text: "А? Ты уже закончил разглагольствовать? Я слегка вздремнул{mf||а} под твою болтовню — можешь повторить сначала?"

traits.locale_text: "Huh? Oh, you're done pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

"Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"
"Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"
"Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

languages.text: «¿Mmm? Ah, ¿por fin has terminado? Creo que me he dormido a mitad de camino, ¿te importaría repetirlo todo desde el principio?».
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Mmm? Ah, ¿por fin has terminado? Creo que me he dormido a mitad de camino, ¿te importaría repetirlo todo desde el principio?».

languages.text: “嗯？噢，你已经念叨完了吗？我好像一不小心听睡着了，你不介意从头再说一遍吧？”
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

traits.locale_text: “嗯？噢，你已经念叨完了吗？我好像一不小心听睡着了，你不介意从头再说一遍吧？”

languages.text: 「ん？ああ、やっと話し終わったか？しばし眠ってしまったようだ…もう一度最初から繰り返してくれないか？」
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

traits.locale_text: 「ん？ああ、やっと話し終わったか？しばし眠ってしまったようだ――もう一度最初から繰り返してくれないか？」

languages.text: "Hmm? Oh, Ihr seid schon fertig mit Eurem Vortrag? Ich muss kurz weggedöst sein – würdet Ihr das Ganze bitte noch mal von Anfang an wiederholen?"
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

traits.locale_text: "Hmm? Oh, Ihr seid schon fertig mit Eurem Vortrag? Ich muss kurz weggedöst sein – würdet Ihr das Ganze bitte noch mal von Anfang an wiederholen?"

languages.text: « Hmm ? Oh, vous avez fini votre monologue ? Je crois que je me suis {mf|assoupi|assoupie} une seconde, vous voulez bien recommencer du début ? »
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

traits.locale_text: « Hmm ? Oh, vous avez fini votre monologue ? Je crois que je me suis {mf|assoupi|assoupie} une seconde, vous voulez bien recommencer du début ? »

languages.text: "Hım? Böbürlenmen bitti mi? Bir ara dalmış olmalıyım. Her şeyi baştan izah edebilirsin sanıyorum?"
languages.original_text: "Hmm? Oh, you're finished pontificating? I think I dozed off there for a second — do you mind repeating the whole thing from the start?"

traits.locale_text: "Hım? Böbürlenmen bitti mi? Bir ara dalmış olmalıyım. Her şeyi baştan izah edebilirsin sanıyorum?"
